Package oracle.kubernetes.operator.helpers

Class AuthorizationProxy

java.lang.Object
oracle.kubernetes.operator.helpers.AuthorizationProxy
public class AuthorizationProxy
extends java.lang.Object
Delegate authorization decisions to Kubernetes ABAC and/or RBAC.

  • Method Details

    • check

      public boolean check​(java.lang.String principal, AuthorizationProxy.Operation operation, AuthorizationProxy.Resource resource, java.lang.String resourceName, AuthorizationProxy.Scope scope, java.lang.String namespaceName)
      Check if the specified principal is allowed to perform the specified operation on the specified resource in the specified scope. Call this version of the method when you know that the principal is not a member of any groups.
      Parameters:
      principal - The user, group or service account.
      operation - The operation to be authorized.
      resource - The kind of resource on which the operation is to be authorized.
      resourceName - The name of the resource instance on which the operation is to be authorized.
      scope - The scope of the operation (cluster or namespace).
      namespaceName - name of the namespace if scope is namespace else null.
      Returns:
      true if the operation is allowed, or false if not.

    • check

      public boolean check​(java.lang.String principal, java.util.List<java.lang.String> groups, AuthorizationProxy.Operation operation, AuthorizationProxy.Resource resource, java.lang.String resourceName, AuthorizationProxy.Scope scope, java.lang.String namespaceName)
      Check if the specified principal is allowed to perform the specified operation on the specified resource in the specified scope.
      Parameters:
      principal - The user, group or service account.
      groups - The groups that principal is a member of.
      operation - The operation to be authorized.
      resource - The kind of resource on which the operation is to be authorized.
      resourceName - The name of the resource instance on which the operation is to be authorized.
      scope - The scope of the operation (cluster or namespace).
      namespaceName - name of the namespace if scope is namespace else null.
      Returns:
      true if the operation is allowed, or false if not.

    • check

      public boolean check​(AuthorizationProxy.Operation operation, AuthorizationProxy.Resource resource, java.lang.String resourceName, AuthorizationProxy.Scope scope, java.lang.String namespaceName)
      Check access.
      Parameters:
      operation - Operator
      resource - Resource
      resourceName - Resource name
      scope - Scope
      namespaceName - Namespace
      Returns:
      True, if authorization is allowed
